Reviews.Title: if you like the iPhone design but want android.
Reviews.Author: ANTHONY ROSATI
Reviews.Content: closest phone to an iPhone copy but, with Android and larger screen. awesome! design is flawless. screen amazing. unlocked and ready to go.

Reviews.Title: I really love this phone!
Reviews.Author: DoubleStars
Reviews.Content: This cell phone has beautiful looking. Very thin, has slightly bigger screen than iphone 5. Most of all, it works fantastically. Very fast speed, either downloading or uploading. The camera works great also. I can take pictures in the rain since it is water proof.

Reviews.Title: Suprised by the look and make
Reviews.Author: Ian Rock
Reviews.Content: Definitly a great phone in terms of look, make, and hardware. Its super thin and light, trading off the batery life a bit. Looking forward p7. 华为加油！

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Sebastian Sepulveda
Reviews.Content: I was very scare because I read a lot of reviews about this phone but now that I have it, this phone is awesome. Great graphis, great camara, the sound is great. If someone wants to have a high end phone I recomend this one.Do not hesitate in buying this phone. It is great. The design is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone- but battery lasts only 7 hours
Reviews.Author: Dirk Wiesemann
Reviews.Content: The phone itself is quite nice. But the built in battery lasts only 5 hours when you are web browsing. Even when you do nothing and the phone is in flight mode, the battery lasts 24 hours only.

Reviews.Title: Good but not in USA
Reviews.Author: Kiran k venepalli
Reviews.Content: Phone is good but data doesn't work with US carriers. Since it's GSM phone, I took AT&T; sim. Though I get the signal, data wouldn't work. I took it to AT&T; store and even they said it doesn't work since it's not US mobile.

Reviews.Title: Broke on the second day of use
Reviews.Author: Aleksey Malyshev
Reviews.Content: The phone is great! It is very nice design and very convenient to use. It had one "hot" pixel in the center of the screen. However I would love to use it, but it broke on the next day and I had to return it to the seller. This was my first attempt to use a Chinese brand. I will stick to European, American or Japanese ones for a few more years.
